entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
